description.full: A new Program, “Anon”,  is called to the Grid to discover the origins of the Abraxas virus and to investigate the disappearance of its creator, Kevin Flynn. Master free-running mobility, martial arts inspired light disc combat, and thrilling light cycle racing in this high-octane prequel to the highly anticipated film TRON: Legacy.
